blocks.name: cs1
blocks.content: Syntax for the singleton word constructor.
blocks.origin: prop class cs1(class c0) { <" c0 "> }

blocks.name: diff.cs1.s
diff.cs1.c
diff.cs1.w
df-s1
blocks.content: Define the canonical injection from symbols to words. Although not required, ` A ` should usually be a set. Otherwise, the singleton word ` <" A "> ` would be the singleton word consisting of the empty set, see ~ s1prc , and not, as maybe expected, the empty word, see also ~ s1nz . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 15-Aug-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2016.)

blocks.name: ids1
blocks.content: Identity function protection for a singleton word. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2016.)

blocks.name: s1val
blocks.content: Value of a singleton word. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 15-Aug-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2016.)

blocks.name: s1rn
blocks.content: The range of a singleton word. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)

blocks.name: s1eq
blocks.content: Equality theorem for a singleton word. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2016.)

blocks.name: s1eqd
blocks.content: Equality theorem for a singleton word. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2016.)

blocks.name: s1cl
blocks.content: A singleton word is a word. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 15-Aug-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2016.) (Proof shortened by AV, 23-Nov-2018.)

blocks.name: s1cld
blocks.content: A singleton word is a word. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2016.)

blocks.name: s1prc
blocks.content: Value of a singleton word if the symbol is a proper class. (Contributed by AV, 26-Mar-2022.)

blocks.name: s1cli
blocks.content: A singleton word is a word. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2016.)

blocks.name: s1len
blocks.content: Length of a singleton word. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 15-Aug-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2016.)

blocks.name: s1nz
blocks.content: A singleton word is not the empty string. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Feb-2016.) (Proof shortened by Kyle Wyonch, 18-Jul-2021.)

blocks.name: s1dm
blocks.content: The domain of a singleton word is a singleton. (Contributed by AV, 9-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm s1dm(class c0) {
  |- wceq(cdm(cs1(c0)), csn(nat0))
} = {
  fdmi(cs1(c0), csn(nat0), universe)
  mpbir(wf(cs1(c0), csn(nat0), universe), wf(cs1(c0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cs1(c0))), universe))
  ax-mp(wf(cs1(c0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cs1(c0))), universe), wcel(cs1(c0), cword(universe)))
  s1cli(c0)
  wrdf(cs1(c0), universe)
  feq2i(cs1(c0), csn(nat0), universe, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cs1(c0))))
  eqcomi(csn(nat0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cs1(c0))))
  ax-mp(wceq(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cs1(c0))), csn(nat0)), wceq(cfv(chash, cs1(c0)), nat1))
  s1len(c0)
  syl6eq(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cs1(c0))), csn(nat0), co(nat0, cfzo, nat1), wceq(cfv(chash, cs1(c0)), nat1))
  oveq2(cfv(chash, cs1(c0)), nat1, nat0, cfzo)
  fzo01()
}

blocks.name: s1dmALT
blocks.content: Alternate version of ~ s1dm , having a shorter proof, but requiring that ` A ` is a set. (Contributed by AV, 9-Jan-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: s1fv
blocks.content: Sole symbol of a singleton word. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 15-Aug-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2016.)

blocks.name: lsws1
blocks.content: The last symbol of a singleton word is its symbol. (Contributed by AV, 22-Oct-2018.)

blocks.name: eqs1
blocks.content: A word of length 1 is a singleton word. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Aug-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 1-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqs1(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1)), wceq(c0, cs1(cfv(c0, nat0))))
} = {
  mpbir2and(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1)), wceq(c0, cs1(cfv(c0, nat0))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, cs1(cfv(c0, nat0)))), wral(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cs1(cfv(c0, nat0)), cv(hs0)))))
  syl6eqr(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, cs1(cfv(c0, nat0))), nat1, wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1))
  s1len(cfv(c0, nat0))
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1)), wral(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cs1(cfv(c0, nat0)), cv(hs0)))), wral(hs0, csn(nat0), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cs1(cfv(c0, nat0)), cv(hs0)))))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1)), wral(hs0, csn(nat0), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cs1(cfv(c0, nat0)), cv(hs0)))), wceq(cfv(c0, nat0), cfv(cs1(cfv(c0, nat0)), nat0)))
  mp1i(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1)), wceq(cfv(c0, nat0), cfv(cs1(cfv(c0, nat0)), nat0)), wcel(cfv(c0, nat0), universe))
  fvex(c0, nat0)
  eqcomd(cfv(c0, nat0), cfv(cs1(cfv(c0, nat0)), nat0), wcel(cfv(c0, nat0), universe))
  s1fv(cfv(c0, nat0), universe)
  ralsn(hs0, nat0, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cs1(cfv(c0, nat0)), cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c0, nat0), cfv(cs1(cfv(c0, nat0)), nat0)))
  c0ex()
  eqeq12d(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cs1(cfv(c0, nat0)), cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, nat0), cfv(cs1(cfv(c0, nat0)), nat0), wceq(cv(hs0), nat0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), nat0, c0)
  fveq2(cv(hs0), nat0, cs1(cfv(c0, nat0)))
  raleqdv(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), csn(nat0), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cs1(cfv(c0, nat0)), cv(hs0))))
  syl6eq(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), csn(nat0), co(nat0, cfzo, nat1), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1), wceq(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), co(nat0, cfzo, nat1)))
  oveq2(cfv(chash, c0), nat1, nat0, cfzo)
  fzo01()
  syldan(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1), wb(wceq(c0, cs1(cfv(c0, nat0))), wa(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, cs1(cfv(c0, nat0)))), wral(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cs1(cfv(c0, nat0)), cv(hs0)))))), wcel(cs1(cfv(c0, nat0)), cword(c1)))
  s1cld(cfv(c0, nat0), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1)))
  mpan(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1)), wcel(cfv(c0, nat0), c1), wcel(nat1, cn))
  1nn()
  fstwrdne0(nat1, c0, c1)
  eqwrd(hs0, c0, c1, cs1(cfv(c0, nat0)))
  diff.hs0.c(nat0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(c0, nat0), cfv(cs1(cfv(c0, nat0)), nat0)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(csn(nat0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cs1(cfv(c0, nat0)))
}

blocks.name: wrdl1exs1
blocks.content: A word of length 1 is a singleton word. (Contributed by AV, 24-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm wrdl1exs1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c0, cs1(cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  rspcedvd(s0, c1, cfv(c0, nat0), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1)), wceq(c0, cs1(cv(s0))), wceq(c0, cs1(cfv(c0, nat0))))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1), wcel(cfv(c0, nat0), c1), wbr(nat1, cle, cfv(chash, c0)))
  mpbiri(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1), wbr(nat1, cle, cfv(chash, c0)), wbr(nat1, cle, nat1))
  1le1()
  breq2(cfv(chash, c0), nat1, nat1, cle)
  wrdsymb1(c0, c1)
  eqeq2d(c0, cs1(cv(s0)), cs1(cfv(c0, nat0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, nat0))))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, nat0)), wceq(cs1(cv(s0)), cs1(cfv(c0, nat0))))
  s1eq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, nat0))
  eqs1(c0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cword(c1))
  diff.cword.s(s0, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cfv(chash, c0), nat1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, chash, c0)
  diff.chash.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, cs1(cfv(c0, nat0)))
  diff.cs1.s(s0, cfv(c0, nat0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm wrdl1exs1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Word(c1)‚àß(# ` c0)= 1)‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, c0 = <" s0 ">))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  rspcedvd(s0, c1, (c0 ` 0), (c0 ‚àà Word(c1)‚àß(# ` c0)= 1), c0 = <" s0 ">, c0 = <"(c0 ` 0)">)
  sylan2(c0 ‚àà Word(c1), (# ` c0)= 1, (c0 ` 0)‚àà c1, 1[‚â§](# ` c0))
  mpbiri((# ` c0)= 1, 1[‚â§](# ` c0), 1[‚â§]1)
  1le1()
  breq2((# ` c0), nat1, nat1, cle)
  wrdsymb1(c0, c1)
  eqeq2d(c0, <" s0 ">, <"(c0 ` 0)">, ((c0 ‚àà Word(c1)‚àß(# ` c0)= 1)‚àß s0 =(c0 ` 0)))
  adantl((c0 ‚àà Word(c1)‚àß(# ` c0)= 1), s0 =(c0 ` 0), <" s0 "> = <"(c0 ` 0)">)
  s1eq(s0, (c0 ` 0))
  eqs1(c0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ‚àà Word(c1), (# ` c0)= 1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, Word(c1))
  diff.cword.s(s0, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (# ` c0), nat1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, chash, c0)
  diff.chash.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, <"(c0 ` 0)">)
  diff.cs1.s(s0, (c0 ` 0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: wrdl1s1
blocks.content: A word of length 1 is a singleton word consisting of the first symbol of the word. (Contributed by AV, 22-Jul-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 14-Oct-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm wrdl1s1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wceq(c2, cs1(c0)), w3a(wcel(c2, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c2), nat1), wceq(cfv(c2, nat0), c0))))
} = {
  impbid1(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cs1(c0)), w3a(wcel(c2, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c2), nat1), wceq(cfv(c2, nat0), c0)))
  syl5ibrcom(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cs1(c0)), w3a(wcel(c2, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c2), nat1), wceq(cfv(c2, nat0), c0)), w3a(wcel(cs1(c0), cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, cs1(c0)), nat1), wceq(cfv(cs1(c0), nat0), c0)))
  3jca(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cs1(c0), cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, cs1(c0)), nat1), wceq(cfv(cs1(c0), nat0), c0))
  s1cl(c0, c1)
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(chash, cs1(c0)), nat1))
  s1len(c0)
  s1fv(c0, c1)
  3anbi123d(wceq(c2, cs1(c0)), wcel(c2, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c2), nat1), wceq(cfv(c2, nat0), c0), wcel(cs1(c0), cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, cs1(c0)), nat1), wceq(cfv(cs1(c0), nat0), c0))
  eleq1(c2, cs1(c0), cword(c1))
  fveqeq2(c2, cs1(c0), chash, nat1)
  eqeq1d(cfv(c2, nat0), c0, cfv(cs1(c0), nat0), wceq(c2, cs1(c0)))
  fveq1(c2, cs1(c0), nat0)
  3impia(wcel(c2, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c2), nat1), wceq(cfv(c2, nat0), c0), wceq(c2, cs1(c0)))
  syl5ibcom(wa(wcel(c2, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c2), nat1)), wceq(cfv(c2, nat0), c0), wceq(c2, cs1(c0)), wceq(c2, cs1(cfv(c2, nat0))))
  eqs1(c2, c1)
  eqeq2d(c2, cs1(cfv(c2, nat0)), cs1(c0), wceq(cfv(c2, nat0), c0))
  s1eq(cfv(c2, nat0), c0)
}

blocks.name: s111
blocks.content: The singleton word function is injective. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Oct-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm s111(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wb(wceq(cs1(c0), cs1(c2)), wceq(c0, c2)))
} = {
  3bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(cs1(c0), cs1(c2)), wceq(c0, c2), wceq(csn(cop(nat0, c0)), csn(cop(nat0, c2))), wceq(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat0, c2)))
  eqeqan12d(cs1(c0), cs1(c2), csn(cop(nat0, c0)), csn(cop(nat0, c2)), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1))
  s1val(c0, c1)
  s1val(c2, c1)
  mp1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wb(wceq(csn(cop(nat0, c0)), csn(cop(nat0, c2))), wceq(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat0, c2))), wcel(cop(nat0, c0), universe))
  opex(nat0, c0)
  sneqbg(cop(nat0, c0), universe, cop(nat0, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wb(wceq(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat0, c2)), wceq(c0, c2)))
  mpan(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wceq(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat0, c2)), wceq(c0, c2)), wcel(nat0, cz))
  0z()
  mpan2(wa(wcel(nat0, cz), wcel(c0, c1)), wb(wceq(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat0, c2)), wceq(c0, c2)), wceq(nat0, nat0))
  eqid(nat0)
  baibd(wa(wcel(nat0, cz), wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(nat0, nat0), wceq(cop(nat0, c0), cop(nat0, c2)), wceq(c0, c2))
  opthg(nat0, cz, c0, c1, nat0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm s111(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí(<" c0 "> = <" c2 "> ‚Üî c0 = c2))
} = {
  3bitrd((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), <" c0 "> = <" c2 ">, c0 = c2, { < 0, c0 > } = { < 0, c2 > }, < 0, c0 > = < 0, c2 >)
  eqeqan12d(<" c0 ">, <" c2 ">, { < 0, c0 > }, { < 0, c2 > }, c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c1)
  s1val(c0, c1)
  s1val(c2, c1)
  mp1i((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), ({ < 0, c0 > } = { < 0, c2 > } ‚Üî < 0, c0 > = < 0, c2 >), < 0, c0 > ‚àà ùïå)
  opex(nat0, c0)
  sneqbg(< 0, c0 >, universe, < 0, c2 >)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c1, (< 0, c0 > = < 0, c2 > ‚Üî c0 = c2))
  mpan(c0 ‚àà c1, (< 0, c0 > = < 0, c2 > ‚Üî c0 = c2), 0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)
  0z()
  mpan2((0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1), (< 0, c0 > = < 0, c2 > ‚Üî c0 = c2), 0 = 0)
  eqid(nat0)
  baibd((0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1), 0 = 0, < 0, c0 > = < 0, c2 >, c0 = c2)
  opthg(nat0, cz, c0, c1, nat0, c2)
}
